nodes.text: A hauler droid was a type of droid that carried cargo. TRK-R was a hauler droid that worked in a settlement on the ocean planet Serelia, using a landspeeder to deliver cargo from the dock. It claimed to be the best hauler droid in the settlement, despite the fact that it once failed to deliver a catch of fish from the resident Verla to the market before the fish began to spoil.
